trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具提供設計階段支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeViewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeViewDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得此設計工具的設計工具的行動清單集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref>與這個設計工具相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 取得之預先定義的自動格式化配置集合中顯示**自動格式化**在設計階段的相關聯控制項的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref>物件，包含控制項的預先定義的配置。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the line images for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，以編輯線條影像的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: 將關聯的控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The data bound control.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，即可編輯資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog box to edit the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 顯示對話方塊，即可編輯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取用來代表控制項設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 用來在設計階段呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取用來呈現關聯控制項的預留位置，在設計階段 HTML 標記文字。

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.
trans-unit.target: 用來在設計階段，使用空的資料來源呈現控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 提供用來在設計階段發生錯誤時呈現該控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception>擲回的是。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 用來在設計階段發生錯誤時呈現該控制項的標記。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 建構可以在相關聯控制項的設計階段使用的範例資料來源。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref>可以做為資料來源控制項衍生自介面<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides for custom initialization of the given <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，提供的自訂初始化給定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that can be cast as a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>可以轉換成<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示控制項設計工具是否使用暫時預覽控制項，以產生設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, if the control designer uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*> property for the control contained in the control designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項設計工具針對設計階段預覽; 使用控制項的暫存副本否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，如果控制項設計工具使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>控制項設計工具中包含之控制項的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component*>
